Trenton.Yardville-Groveville, New Jersey: Yardville-Groveville was an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) located within Hamilton Township, in Mercer County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2000 United States Census, the CDP's population was 9,208. As of the 2010 Census, the area was split into two CDPs, Yardville and Groveville.
